Uses of Class
org.pepstock.charba.client.items.TooltipLabelColor

  • Packages that use TooltipLabelColor 
    Package Description
    org.pepstock.charba.client
    Main package with all charts implementation, global classes and common interfaces.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks
    All callbacks interfaces to be implemented, also to use the scriptable options of CHART.JS.
    org.pepstock.charba.client.items
    Contains all elements generated by CHART.JS, which are mapping java script objects, to use at runtime in plugins, events or controllers.

    • Uses of TooltipLabelColor in org.pepstock.charba.client

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client that return TooltipLabelColor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TooltipLabelColor Defaults.invokeTooltipsCallbackOnLabelColor(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)
      Returns the default colors to render for the tooltip item.

    • Uses of TooltipLabelColor in org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks that return TooltipLabelColor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TooltipLabelColor AbstractTooltipLabelCallback.onLabelColor(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item) 
      default TooltipLabelColor TooltipLabelCallback.onLabelColor(IsChart chart, TooltipItem item)
      Returns the colors and borders to render for the tooltip item.
      If returns null, it will be ignored.

    • Uses of TooltipLabelColor in org.pepstock.charba.client.items

      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.items that return TooltipLabelColor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TooltipLabelColor TooltipLabelColor.TooltipLabelColorFactory.create(NativeObject nativeObject) 
      TooltipLabelColor DatasetElementOptions.createTooltipLabelColor()
      Create new TooltipLabelColor filling it with background and border color of dataset element.
      Methods in org.pepstock.charba.client.items that return types with arguments of type TooltipLabelColor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<TooltipLabelColor> TooltipModel.getLabelColors()
      Returns the list of labels color of tooltip.
      List<TooltipLabelColor> TooltipModel.getTextLabelColors()
      Returns the list of labels text color of tooltip.
